name: picoc

readme.summary: This is merely a redirect notice with no actual documentation about the package itself.
readme.top_issue: The README only contains a repository migration notice and provides no information about what picoc is, how to install it, or how to use it.

sentiment.summary: PicoC shows severe signs of abandonment with multiple unresponded issues dating back to 2015-2018, critical bugs unfixed, no releases, and zero maintainer engagement.

concerns: No commits in over 5 years (last commit June 2018)

maintenance.summary: The picoc project is abandoned with no maintenance activity for over 5 years and 30 unresolved issues.
